1.name: The Terminator
1.description: A seemingly indestructible robot is sent from 2029 to 1984 to assassinate a young waitress, whose unborn son will lead humanity in a war against sentient machines, while a human soldier from the same war is sent to protect her at all costs.

2.name: Ghostbusters
2.description: Three former parapsychology professors set up shop as a unique ghost removal service.

3.name: Dune
3.description: A Duke's son leads desert warriors against the galactic emperor and his father's evil nemesis when they assassinate his father and free their desert world from the emperor's rule.

4.name: The NeverEnding Story
4.description: A troubled boy dives into a wondrous fantasy world through the pages of a mysterious book.

5.name: Once Upon a Time in America
5.description: A former Prohibition-era Jewish gangster returns to the Lower East Side of Manhattan over thirty years later, where he once again must confront the ghosts and regrets of his old life.

6.name: The Karate Kid
6.description: A Japanese martial arts instructor agrees to teach karate to a bullied teenager.

7.name: Sixteen Candles
7.description: A girl's "sweet" sixteenth birthday becomes anything but special, as she suffers from every embarrassment possible.

8.name: Gremlins
8.description: A boy inadvertently breaks three important rules concerning his new pet and unleashes a horde of malevolently mischievous monsters on a small town.

9.name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
9.description: In 1935, Indiana Jones arrives in India, still part of the British Empire, and is asked to find a mystical stone. He then stumbles upon a secret cult committing enslavement and human sacrifices in the catacombs of an ancient palace.

10.name: A Nightmare on Elm Street
10.description: The monstrous spirit of a slain janitor seeks revenge by invading the dreams of teenagers whose parents were responsible for his untimely death.

11.name: Police Academy
11.description: A group of good-hearted, but incompetent misfits enter the police academy, but the instructors there are not going to put up with their pranks.

12.name: Red Dawn
12.description: It is the dawn of World War III. In mid-western America, a group of teenagers band together to defend their town, and their country, from invading Soviet forces.

13.name: Amadeus
13.description: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.

14.name: Revenge of the Nerds
14.description: At Adams College, a group of bullied outcasts and misfits resolve to fight back for their peace and self-respect.

15.name: Footloose
15.description: A city teenager moves to a small town where rock music and dancing have been banned, and his rebellious spirit shakes up the populace.

16.name: Beverly Hills Cop
16.description: A freewheeling Detroit cop pursuing a murder investigation finds himself dealing with the very different culture of Beverly Hills.

17.name: Romancing the Stone
17.description: A mousy romance novelist sets off for Colombia to ransom her kidnapped sister, and soon finds herself in the middle of a dangerous adventure hunting for treasure with a mercenary rogue.

18.name: This Is Spinal Tap
18.description: Spinal Tap, one of England's loudest bands, is chronicled by film director Marty DiBergi on what proves to be a fateful tour.

19.name: Splash
19.description: A young man is reunited with a mermaid who saved him from drowning as a boy. He falls in love with her, not knowing who or what she is.

20.name: Friday the 13th: The Final Chapter
20.description: After being mortally wounded and taken to the morgue, murderer Jason Voorhees spontaneously revives and embarks on a killing spree as he makes his way back to his home at Camp Crystal Lake.

21.name: The Adventures of Buckaroo Banzai Across the 8th Dimension
21.description: Adventurer, brain surgeon, rock musician Buckaroo Banzai and his crime-fighting team, the Hong Kong Cavaliers, must stop evil alien invaders from the eighth dimension who are planning to conquer Earth.

22.name: Bolero
22.description: Set in the 1920s, a young woman sets out to lose her virginity. Her mission leads her to a Moroccan sheikh and a Spanish bullfighter.

23.name: Streets of Fire
23.description: A mercenary is hired to rescue his ex-girlfriend, a singer who has been kidnapped by a motorcycle gang.

24.name: Nineteen Eighty-Four
24.description: In a totalitarian future society, a man, whose daily work is re-writing history, tries to rebel by falling in love.

25.name: Paris, Texas
25.description: Travis Henderson, an aimless drifter who has been missing for four years, wanders out of the desert and must reconnect with society, himself, his life, and his family.

26.name: Children of the Corn
26.description: A young couple is trapped in a remote town where a dangerous religious cult of children believe everyone over the age of 18 must be killed.

27.name: The Last Starfighter
27.description: Video game expert Alex Rogan finds himself transported to another planet after conquering The Last Starfighter video game only to find out it was just a test. He was recruited to join the team of best starfighters to defend their world from the attack.

28.name: Tank
28.description: Sergeant Major Zack arrives at a new army base with his wife, son and Sherman tank. One night at a bar he "stops" a pimp/deputy from beating a girl. The corrupt sheriff uses Zack's son for revenge and Zack uses his tank.

29.name: Runaway
29.description: In the near future, a police officer specializes in malfunctioning robots. When a robot turns out to have been programmed to kill, he begins to uncover a homicidal plot to create killer robots... and his son becomes a target.

30.name: The Woman in Red
30.description: On his way to work, Teddy spots Charlotte, an incredibly beautiful Woman in Red. He really wants to meet her, but what would his wife say?

31.name: Top Secret!
31.description: Parody of WWII spy movies in which an American rock and roll singer becomes involved in a Resistance plot to rescue a scientist imprisoned in East Germany.

32.name: Body Double
32.description: A young actor's obsession with spying on a beautiful woman who lives nearby leads to a baffling series of events with drastic consequences.

33.name: Places in the Heart
33.description: In central Texas in the 1930s, a widow, with two small children, tries to run her small 40-acre farm with the help of two disparate people.

34.name: Conan the Destroyer
34.description: Conan leads a ragtag group of adventurers on a quest for a princess.

35.name: Firestarter
35.description: A couple who participated in a potent medical experiment gain telekinetic ability and then have a child who is pyrokinetic.

36.name: Bachelor Party
36.description: A soon-to-be-married man's friends throw him the ultimate bachelor party.

37.name: Kaze no tani no Naushika
37.description: Warrior and pacifist Princess Nausicaä desperately struggles to prevent two warring nations from destroying themselves and their dying planet.

38.name: Blood Simple
38.description: A rich but jealous man hires a private investigator to kill his cheating wife and her new man. But, when blood is involved, nothing is simple.

39.name: The Natural
39.description: An unknown comes seemingly out of nowhere to become a legendary player with almost divine talent.

40.name: The Bounty
40.description: Fed up with their Captain's harsh discipline, a sailing ship's crew decides to take action.

41.name: Birdy
41.description: After two friends return home from the Vietnam War one becomes mentally unstable and obsesses with becoming a bird.

42.name: Against All Odds
42.description: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

43.name: 2010: The Year We Make Contact
43.description: A joint U.S.-Soviet expedition is sent to Jupiter to learn what happened to the Discovery... and HAL.

44.name: Supergirl
44.description: After losing a powerful orb, Kara Zor-El, Superman's cousin, comes to Earth to retrieve it and instead finds herself up against a wicked witch.

45.name: Night of the Comet
45.description: A comet wipes out most of life on Earth, leaving two Valley Girls fighting against cannibal zombies and a sinister group of scientists.

46.name: Starman
46.description: An alien takes the form of a young widow's husband and asks her to drive him from Wisconsin to Arizona. The government tries to stop them.

47.name: Repo Man
47.description: Young punk Otto becomes a repo man after helping to steal a car, and stumbles into a world of wackiness as a result.

48.name: Hardbodies
48.description: Three middle-aged daddies visit California to have a marvelous time at the beach. When they learn that a nice apartment and an expensive cabriolet isn't enough for them to score with the ...                See full summary »

49.name: The Toxic Avenger
49.description: Tromaville has a monstrous new hero. The Toxic Avenger is born when meek mop boy Melvin falls into a vat of toxic waste. Now evildoers will have a lot to lose.

50.name: The Company of Wolves
50.description: A teenage girl in a country manor falls asleep while reading a magazine, and has a disturbing dream involving wolves prowling the woods below her bedroom window.
